question: What was India's forex reserve position as of June 2025?
explanation: India's forex reserves reached $650 billion as of June 2025, as per RBI data.

question: Which Indian state became the first to implement blockchain technology in land records?
explanation: Telangana implemented blockchain technology for land records on January 1, 2025, across all districts.

question: Who was appointed as the new Chief of Naval Staff in June 2025?
explanation: Vice Admiral Dinesh Tripathi took charge as Chief of Naval Staff on June 1, 2025.

question: Which Indian city hosted the World Book Fair 2025?
explanation: New Delhi hosted the World Book Fair from January 5-13, 2025, with France as guest country.

question: What was India's position in the Global Hunger Index 2025?
explanation: India ranked 95th in the Global Hunger Index 2025, improving 12 positions from 2024.

question: Which Indian state launched the 'Zero Electricity Bill' scheme in April 2025?
explanation: Kerala launched the 'Zero Electricity Bill' scheme on April 1, 2025, providing free power up to 100 units to BPL families.

question: Who was appointed as the new Chief of Air Staff in March 2025?
explanation: Air Marshal Sandeep Singh took charge as Chief of Air Staff on March 1, 2025.

question: Which Indian state recorded the highest literacy rate in 2025?
explanation: Mizoram recorded 98.5% literacy rate in 2025, surpassing Kerala (96.2%) for the first time.

question: What was the name of India's first Arctic research station inaugurated in 2025?
explanation: 'Himadri', India's first Arctic research station, was inaugurated on March 20, 2025, in Norway's Svalbard archipelago.

question: Which Indian city was selected to host the 2027 Asian Athletics Championships?
explanation: Bhubaneswar was selected to host the 2027 Asian Athletics Championships during the AAA Council meeting on April 10, 2025.

question: Who was appointed as the new Chairman of NITI Aayog in February 2025?
explanation: Suman Bery, former Chief Economist of Shell, was appointed as NITI Aayog Vice Chairman on February 15, 2025.

question: Which Indian state became the first to implement the National Education Policy 2025?
explanation: Karnataka became the first state to fully implement NEP 2025 from the academic year starting June 2025.

question: What was India's ranking in the World Digital Competitiveness Ranking 2025?
explanation: India ranked 35th in the IMD World Digital Competitiveness Ranking 2025, released on May 15.

question: Which Indian city hosted the International Film Festival of India (IFFI) 2025?
explanation: Goa hosted the 56th International Film Festival of India from February 20-28, 2025.

question: Which Indian state launched the 'Mission 2030: Green Cover' initiative?
explanation: Uttar Pradesh launched 'Mission 2030: Green Cover' on June 5, 2025, aiming to increase forest cover to 20%.

question: What was India's position in the Global Cybersecurity Index 2025?
explanation: India ranked 10th in the Global Cybersecurity Index 2025, improving from 23rd position in 2024.

question: Which Indian became the first to win the Abel Prize in Mathematics?
explanation: M.S. Narasimhan was awarded the Abel Prize 2025 on March 25 for his contributions to algebraic geometry.

question: Which Indian state recorded the highest GST collection in Q1 2025?
explanation: Maharashtra recorded highest GST collection of ₹42,500 crore in Q1 2025 among all states.

question: What was the name of India's first private space launch vehicle launched in 2025?
explanation: Agnibaan, India's first private space launch vehicle by Agnikul Cosmos, was successfully launched on March 22, 2025.

question: Which Indian city was ranked as the world's most congested city in 2025?
explanation: Bengaluru was ranked as the world's most congested city in the TomTom Traffic Index 2025 released on January 30.

question: Who was appointed as the new Chief Information Commissioner in May 2025?
explanation: Heeralal Samariya was appointed as Chief Information Commissioner on May 15, 2025.

question: Which Indian state became the first to implement the 'One Nation, One Ration Card' system?
explanation: Andhra Pradesh became the first state to fully implement 'One Nation, One Ration Card' on January 1, 2025.

question: What was India's rank in the Global Peace Index 2025?
explanation: India ranked 135th in the Global Peace Index 2025, improving 8 positions from 2024.

question: Which Indian city hosted the Indian Science Congress in January 2025?
explanation: Lucknow hosted the 112th Indian Science Congress from January 3-7, 2025.

question: Who was appointed as the new Governor of RBI in June 2025?
explanation: T. Rabi Sankar, Deputy Governor, was appointed as RBI Governor on June 1, 2025.

question: Which Indian state launched the 'Digital Health Mission' in February 2025?
explanation: Kerala launched the comprehensive Digital Health Mission on February 14, 2025, integrating all health records.

question: What was India's position in the Global Talent Competitiveness Index 2025?
explanation: India ranked 58th in the Global Talent Competitiveness Index 2025, released on January 25.

question: Which Indian city was selected as the 'World Book Capital 2025' by UNESCO?
explanation: Kolkata was designated as UNESCO World Book Capital 2025 on April 23, 2025.

question: Who was appointed as the new Chief Justice of Delhi High Court in March 2025?
explanation: Justice Satish Chandra Sharma was appointed as Chief Justice of Delhi High Court on March 10, 2025.

question: Which Indian state became the first to achieve 100% digital land records?
explanation: Haryana became the first state to achieve 100% digital land records on February 28, 2025.

question: What was India's rank in the Global Climate Risk Index 2025?
explanation: India ranked 7th in the Global Climate Risk Index 2025, released on January 20, 2025.

question: Which Indian city hosted the World Sustainable Development Summit 2025?
explanation: New Delhi hosted the World Sustainable Development Summit from February 10-12, 2025.

question: Who was appointed as the new Chief of Defence Staff in April 2025?
explanation: Lt Gen Manoj Pande was appointed as Chief of Defence Staff on April 1, 2025.

question: Which Indian state launched the 'Startup Yatra 3.0' in June 2025?
explanation: Telangana launched Startup Yatra 3.0 on June 15, 2025, to identify and support 1,000 startups.

question: What was India's position in the Global Liveability Index 2025?
explanation: India ranked 130th in the Economist Intelligence Unit's Global Liveability Index 2025.

question: Which Indian city hosted the Global Investors Summit in January 2025?
explanation: Indore hosted the Madhya Pradesh Global Investors Summit from January 18-20, 2025.

question: Who was appointed as the new Chairman of UPSC in May 2025?
explanation: Dr. Smita Nagaraj was appointed as UPSC Chairman on May 1, 2025, becoming the first woman to hold the position.

question: Which Indian state became the first to implement the 'Three-language formula'?
explanation: Karnataka became the first state to implement the 'Three-language formula' from academic year 2025-26.

question: What was India's rank in the Human Development Index 2025?
explanation: India ranked 132nd in the Human Development Index 2025, released on March 15.

question: Which Indian city hosted the International Trade Fair 2025?
explanation: New Delhi hosted the India International Trade Fair from November 14-27, 2024 (results announced in Jan 2025).

question: Who was appointed as the new Solicitor General of India in February 2025?
explanation: Tushar Mehta was reappointed as Solicitor General of India on February 1, 2025.

question: Which Indian state launched the 'Free Public Transport for Women' scheme?
explanation: Punjab launched free public transport for women on March 8, 2025, on International Women's Day.

question: What was India's position in the World Economic Forum's Travel & Tourism Index 2025?
explanation: India ranked 40th in the World Economic Forum's Travel & Tourism Development Index 2025.

question: Which Indian city hosted the International Yoga Festival 2025?
explanation: Rishikesh hosted the International Yoga Festival from March 1-7, 2025.

question: Who was appointed as the new Director of RAW in April 2025?
explanation: Arvind Kumar, former Special Secretary, was appointed as Director of Research and Analysis Wing on April 1, 2025.

question: Which Indian state became the first to implement the 'Right to Health'?
explanation: Rajasthan became the first state to implement the 'Right to Health' on April 7, 2025 (World Health Day).

question: What was India's rank in the Global Innovation Index for Agriculture 2025?
explanation: India ranked 30th in the Global Innovation Index for Agriculture 2025, released on June 10.

question: Which Indian city hosted the World Economic Forum India Summit 2025?
explanation: New Delhi hosted the World Economic Forum India Summit from May 15-17, 2025.

question: Who was appointed as the new Chief of the Army Design Bureau in March 2025?
explanation: Lt Gen P.R. Shankar was appointed as Chief of Army Design Bureau on March 1, 2025.

question: Which Indian state became the first to achieve 100% tap water connection?
explanation: Goa became the first state to achieve 100% tap water connection under Jal Jeevan Mission on January 26, 2025.

question: What was India's position in the Global AI Readiness Index 2025?
explanation: India ranked 15th in the Global AI Readiness Index 2025, released on February 10.

question: Which Indian city was selected to host the 2026 Davis Cup Finals?
explanation: Bengaluru was selected to host the 2026 Davis Cup Finals during the ITF meeting on April 5, 2025.

question: Who was appointed as the new Chief of the Integrated Defence Staff in June 2025?
explanation: Lt Gen P.S. Rajeshwar was appointed as Chief of Integrated Defence Staff on June 1, 2025.

question: Which Indian state launched the 'Zero Farmer Suicide' initiative in May 2025?
explanation: Maharashtra launched the 'Zero Farmer Suicide' initiative on May 1, 2025, with comprehensive support systems.

question: What was India's rank in the Global Democracy Index 2025?
explanation: India ranked 53rd in the Economist Intelligence Unit's Democracy Index 2025, released on January 22.

question: Which Indian city hosted the Global Ayurveda Festival 2025?
explanation: Thiruvananthapuram hosted the Global Ayurveda Festival from February 1-5, 2025.

question: Who was appointed as the new Director General of CRPF in April 2025?
explanation: Sujoy Lal Thaosen was appointed as DG CRPF on April 1, 2025.
